# dispatchType

**Instance Property**

The dispatch type to use when submitting compute work to the GPU.

## Declaration

```swift
var dispatchType: MTLDispatchType { get }
```

## Discussion

You set this property when you create the command encoder, and it doesn’t change for the remainder of the encoding.

See [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/makeComputeCommandEncoder(dispatchType:)] for more information.

## Configuring the pipeline state

- **setComputePipelineState(_:)**: Configures the compute encoder with a pipeline state for subsequent kernel calls.
